docs.title: HelloSayer
docs.text:
HelloSayer (name)

Say hello to to using say_hello

source

docs.title: HelloSayer.instance_method
docs.text:
HelloSayer.instance_method ()

Do the saying

assert HelloSayer.static_method() == "Hello from static_method", HelloSayer.static_method()

hs = HelloSayer("world")
assert hs.instance_method() == "Hello world from instance_method", hs.instance_method()
assert HelloSayer.class_method() == "Hello from class_method", HelloSayer.class_method()

docs.title: HelloSayer
docs.text: nbdev_mkdocs_test.core.HelloSayer

docs.title: HelloSayer
docs.text:
Say hello to to using say_hello

Source code in nbdev_mkdocs_test/core.py 
class HelloSayer:
"""Say hello to `to` using `say_hello`"""
    def __init__(self, name): self.name = name

    @staticmethod
    def static_method():
"""Do the saying"""
        return "Hello from static_method"

    @classmethod
    def class_method(cls):
"""Do the saying"""
        return "Hello from class_method"

docs.title: class_method() classmethod
docs.text:
Do the saying

Source code in nbdev_mkdocs_test/core.py 
@classmethod
def class_method(cls):
"""Do the saying"""
    return "Hello from class_method"

docs.title: instance_method(self)
docs.text:
Do the saying

Source code in nbdev_mkdocs_test/core.py 
@patch
def instance_method(self: HelloSayer):
"""Do the saying"""
    return f"Hello {self.name} from instance_method"
